properties.areaDesc: Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 11 at 4:03AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Gale Warning, expect sustained winds up to 25
knots from the west with gusts up to 37 knots. The largest
significant waves will be 3 feet with a potential maximum wave
height of 5 feet. During the Low Water Advisory, water level
drops much below recent average and possibly as low as chart
datum by Sunday morning.

* WHERE...Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to
North Cape MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 4 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 6 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY
